name: Automóvel Club de Portugal
goal: As an Automobile Club, to defend its members' interests,  improve mobility and make roads safe.
euInitiatives:
As a member of the Féderation International de L´Automobile, ACP follows several EU initiatives, policies and legislative processes related to mobility and road safety themes.

As an exemple, one of the latests initiatives ACP has been following is the proposal presented by the European Commission for a regulation of the European Parliament and Council on the approval and market survaillance of motor vehicles and their trailers and of systems, componentes and separate technical units intended for such vehicles and also the amendments which are being proposed by the European Commission to the Euro 6 environmental test requirements for light duty vehicles.
